##switch
寫成描述的形式
```{r}
n<- 541

conditionExpression_outcome=
  ifelse(n %% 2==0, "even", "odd") 

switch(
  conditionExpression_outcome,
  "even"={fvalue <- n/2}, # 偶數
  "odd"=fvalue <- -(n+1)/2, # 奇數；只有一行指令可省略{}
  warning("n要整數喔")  
)

print(fvalue)
```

```{r}
myFun <- function(x,y){
  return(x**y+15)
}

# 等同於
myFun2 <- function(x,y){
  x**y+15
}

myFun(5,3) -> outcome
myFun2(5,3) -> outcome2
print(outcome)
print(outcome2)
```

```{r}
grade <- sample(1:100, 10, replace=T)

grade %>%
  cut(c(-1,69,79,89,100)) -> grade

levels(grade)

switch(
  as.character(grade[[1]]),   #要字串
  "(-1,69]"={
    print("-_-")
    "F"},
  "(69,79]"={
    print("棒")
    "C"
    },
  "(79,89]"={
    print("好棒")
    "B"
    },
  "(89,100]"={
    print("好棒棒")
    "A"
    }
) -> letterGrade # 有回存時要螢幕印出的訊息一定要加print
```
